snippet: Since Dale Earnhardt’s death at the 2001 Daytona 500, Nascar has had its longest stretch without a fatality, but recent crashes have again drawn attention to racers’ well-being.
abstract: Nascar has had its longest stretch without a fatality, since Dal Earnhardt's death at the 2001 Daytona 500, but recent crashes have again drawn attention to racers’ well-being.
lead_paragraph: Since Dale Earnhardt’s death at the 2001 Daytona 500, Nascar has had its longest stretch without a fatality, but recent crashes have again drawn attention to racers’ well-being.

headline.seo: Nascar Driver Injuries Renew Focus on Safety
headline.main: High Speeds, Injuries and Competition Lead to Renewed Safety Focus
headline.print_headline: High Speeds, Injuries and More Competition Lead to a Renewed Focus on Safety

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
